data.text: More guilty and most guilty are more common.

data.chText: 感到内疚的；感到惭愧的
data.enText: feeling ashamed because you have done sth that you know is wrong or have not done sth that you should have done

data.chText: 我因没有常去看望父母而感到内疚。
data.enText: I felt guilty about not visiting my parents more often.

data.chText: 约翰脸上显出惭愧的表情。
data.enText: John had a guilty look on his face.
I had a guilty conscience and could not sleep.

data.chText: 犯了罪；有过失的；有罪责的
data.enText: having done sth illegal; being responsible for sth bad that has happened
The jury found the defendant not guilty of the offence.
the guilty party (= the person responsible for sth bad happening)

data.chText: 我们每个人一生中都有过自私自利的过失。
data.enText: We've all been guilty of selfishness at some time in our lives.
a secret that sb feels ashamed about

ex.zh: 认定某人有罪（或有过失）的
证明某人有罪（或有过失）的

data.enText: a secret that sb feels ashamed about

example: the hangdog and shamefaced air of the retreating enemy"- Eric Linklate

tr: responsible for or chargeable with a reprehensible act

value.def: If you feel guilty, you feel unhappy because you think that you have done something wrong or have failed to do something which you should have done.

example.ex: I feel so guilty, leaving all this to you...
example.tran: 把这些事都留给你去做，我真感到过意不去。

example.ex: When she saw me she looked guilty.

gramarinfo.label: usu v-link ADJ, oft ADJ <l>about</l> n

example.ex: He glanced guiltily over his shoulder.

value.def: Guilty is used of an action or fact that you feel guilty about.

example.ex: Many may be keeping it a guilty secret...
example.tran: 许多人或许保守着这个罪恶的秘密。

example.ex: I leave with a guilty sense of relief.
example.tran: 我带着一种罪恶的解脱感离开。

value.def: If someone is guilty of a crime or offence, they have committed that crime or offence.

example.ex: They were found guilty of murder...
He pleaded guilty to causing actual bodily harm.
example.tran: 他承认确实犯有人身伤害罪。

value.def: If someone is guilty of doing something wrong, they have done that thing.

example.ex: He claimed Mr Brooke had been guilty of a 'gross error of judgment'...
example.tran: 他宣称布鲁克先生犯有“判断失误的重大过错”。

example.ex: They will consider whether or not he has been guilty of serious professional misconduct.
example.tran: 他们将考虑他是否犯有玩忽职守的重大过失。

trans: 罪恶装备；圣骑士之战；罪恶工具；罪恶克星；格斗圣骑士产
认罪；服罪；被检控的罪名；认罪服法从而减轻处罚制度；认罪的
罪恶感；愧疚心理；罪咎感；愧疚感；负罪感

罪恶感；愧疚心理；罪咎感；愧疚感；负罪感
